definition: ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: I refuse to even use the hyphenated term Chinese-American.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至拒絕使用“美籍華裔”這個組合詞。

sentences.english: Exclude Chinese-Americans and the figure drops to two or three.
sentences.chinese: 不包括華裔美國人的話，這一數字下降至兩三名。

sentences.english: Representatives of Chinese-American groups that appeared at the news conference supported the resolution.
sentences.chinese: 記者招待會上，華裔代表們對此決議表示強烈支持。

sentences.english: In Asia American woman writer Maxine Hong Kingston's works, there is a strong sense of intertextuality.
sentences.chinese: 美國華裔女作家湯亭亭的作品瀰漫着強烈的互文意識。

sentences.english: Chao is the first Chinese person to hold a position in the US cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 趙曉蘭是美國曆史上首位進入內閣的華裔。

sentences.english: Chapter 2 is the summary of Chinese American literature of matrilineage.
sentences.chinese: 第二章是對華裔母系文學的總論。

sentences.english: About 20% of the city is of ethnic Chinese origin now.
sentences.chinese: 現在這個城市20%的人口都是華裔中國人。

sentences.english: Interest in retaining the Chinese language is growing among Chinese-Canadians.
sentences.chinese: 越來越多的加拿大華裔渴望進修中文。

sentences.english: He is also the youngest Chinese-American delegate at the Republican National Convention.
sentences.chinese: 他也是共和黨全國代表大會最年輕的華裔黨代表。

sentences.english: Zhao is the first Chinese person to hold a position in the US cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 趙曉蘭是美國曆史上首位進入內閣的華裔。

sentences.english: One sweet Chinese girl, who is good-looking , turned sexual contact with her boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 該校一名相貌甜美的華裔女生跟男友親熱性接觸。

sentences.english: The Suharto-led Pribumi regime dictated that NO Chinese in Indonesia can have Chinese name.
sentences.chinese: 儘管他們是華裔，但他們不能起中國名字。

sentences.english: He said that now, the consciousness to participate in politics among Chinese-Americans is being raised gradually.
sentences.chinese: 他說，現在華裔羣體參政意識正逐步提高。

sentences.english: Overseas Chinese scholars should possess a position in Chinese modern academic history.
sentences.chinese: 海外華裔學人在中國現代學術史上應占有一席之地。

sentences.english: Many artists took part, including Chinese-Canadians.
sentences.chinese: 畫家參與，包括華裔女子在內。

sentences.english: Li Zhen-dao is a Chinese-born American scientist.
sentences.chinese: 李政道是一個美籍華裔科學家。

definition: student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
Chinatown/also called 唐人街[Tang2 ren2 jie1]
overseas Chinese/(in a restricted sense) Chinese emigrant who still retains Chinese nationality/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
to hold an office or post
